import './App.css'; import React, { useEffect } from "react" import shopdata from "./component/shopData" import Homepage from "./pages/homepage/Homepage" import Header from "./component/header/Header" import Footer from "./component/footer/Footer" import { Switch, Route } from "react-router-dom" import ShopPage from "./pages/shop-page/ShopPage" import { addCollectionAndDocument } from "./firebase/firebase.utils" function App() { useEffect(() => { addCollectionAndDocument("collections", shopData.map(({ title, items }) => ({ title, items }))) }, []) return
} export default App;
